name: Convert XML POS Tag to _POS
content:
<header>
<sentence id="1">
  <word wid="0" pos="NNS">Scientists</word>
  <word wid="1" pos="VBP">chase</word>
  <word wid="2" pos="VBG">towering</word>
  <word wid="3" pos="NNS">seas</word>
  <word wid="4" pos="WDT">that</word>
  <word wid="5" pos="VBP">smash</word>
  <word wid="6" pos="NNP">Arctic</word>
  <word wid="7" pos="NN">ice</word>
  <word wid="8" pos=",">,</word>
  <word wid="9" pos="IN">with</word>
  <word wid="10" pos="JJ">far-flung</word>
  <word wid="11" pos="NNS">effects</word>
  <word wid="12" pos="IN">on</word>
  <word wid="13" pos="NN">climate</word>
  <word wid="14" pos="CC">and</word>
  <word wid="15" pos="NN">ecology</word>
</sentence>

</header>
